AboutPage.name: ROSANNA
AboutPage.bio:
I’m a Front-End Developer focused on building clear, smooth, and enjoyable user interfaces. I love turning ideas into real experiences, taking care of both the design and the code behind them. I mainly work with React, React Native, and Next.js, and I especially enjoy bringing projects to life through animations, micro-interactions, and details that truly make a difference. 
I’m curious, consistent, and I enjoy learning by doing. I’ve worked on real projects, collaborating with teams and tackling challenges that helped me grow both technically and professionally. My goal is to keep evolving as a developer, add value through my work, and build products that feel good from the very first scroll.

sirenasApp.title:
SIRENAS
PROJECT
APP
sirenasApp.description: The Sirenas Project App was developed to offer users a smooth and intuitive mobile experience, facilitating access to key content, functionalities, and communications of the project.

sirenasWeb.title: WEB APP SIRENAS.TV
sirenasWeb.description: Complete web platform for streaming and multimedia content management. Built with modern technologies to ensure an optimal and scalable user experience.

crmSirenas.title: SIRENAS PROJECT CRM
crmSirenas.description: CRM for customer and sales management at Sirenas, a company dedicated to selling marine products. This CRM allows users to manage contacts, sales opportunities, interaction tracking, and report generation to optimize the sales process.
